title: Spaghetti with roast cherry tomatoes and poached egg
ingredients: ['200 to 300g cherry tomatoes, halved', 'fresh thyme, finely chopped', '3 to 4 garlic cloves, finely chopped', 'olive oil', 'salt and black pepper, to taste', '400 to 500g spaghetti', '4 eggs', 'grated Parmesan cheese to serve', 'fresh basil leaves (optional)']
